tech.title: Full-Stack Software
tech.body: RESTful API Development, Rails, JavaScript + Frameworks/Libraries, Node.js, Salesforce APEX, Angular, React, React Native (iOS/Android), Shopify and much more…. Covering the web front end, back end, data storage, mobile, authentiation strategies and security

tech.title: Consultation
tech.body: Have your big idea? Contact Canal West for consultation: MVP (Minimum Viable Product) Planning, Wireframes, Milestone/User Story Planning, Quote Expectaions – Saving You Money and Time – Before Development, with us or a “big–time” agency
